1.content:
The Keroro Platoon have tried & failed several times to capture Pokopen/Pekopon for their home planet Keron. And sometimes their plans haven't even gotten off the ground. But Sgt. Keroro is determined to one day take over.

One day, Keroro held a meeting with his platoon, Private Second Class Tamama, a cute young Keron with a very ugly split personality, Corporal Giroro, the trigger happy munitions expert with a fiery temper, Sergant Major Kururu, the brilliant but demented inventor known for his dark personality, and he even brought in Lance Corporal Dororo, the often-forgotten ninja. Also there was Angol Moa, destroyer of worlds & niece-figure & lover of Keroro, (Tamama despises her, because he admired Keroro as well)

"Listen up," the Sergeant announced, "I've finally figured out how we can take Pekopon!"

"You always say that..." replied Giroro. He knew the past several hundred plans to overtake Pekopon have failed, usually because of Keroro's tendency to not finish the plans for invasion.

"This time it will be different from the past several hundred times! Kururu?"

"Kukuku," snickered Kururu, "using the technology & parts of several of our past inventions used for transforming, including the Age Transformation Gun & the Oni Girl Gun, I have created... The MULTI TF GUN! It can change age, make people into animals, & change size & appearance, as well as a few other effects."

"Gero gero, Excellent!" said Keroro.

"Small Problem, though."

"What is it?"

"I haven't tested it yet, but I will quickly."

"You're not testing it on me!" Giroro shouted. Giroro was always used as the guinea pig for Kururu's twisted experiments, and he wasn't going to allow himself to be exposed to the numerous effects of THAT weapon!

"I'll find a test subject," announced Keroro, taking it from the inventor's grasp, "and soon we'll have Pekopon on their knees!"

He decided to test it on...
1.title: The Newest Invasion Plan

11.content:
Keroro decided to use Natsumi, the teenaged Hinata girl, as a victim, since she had been bossing him around, beating him senseless, and forcing him to do chores ever since he landed on Pekopon. This, he figured, would be payback time!

Later, Keroro decided to lounge around his room (which used to be the house's basement and led to the Keroro Platoon's hideout) in order to lull Natsumi into a false sense of security. Any time now, she'd be yelling for him...

"STUPID FROG!!!"

"Ah, right on schedule," Keroro chuckled to himself.

Just then, the door burst open and there was Natsumi, mad as heck. "What do you think you're doing?"

"Oh, nothing," the Keronian responded.

"Well, there's a sink full of dirty dishes & it's your turn to wash & dry them!"

Just then, she noticed that Keroro wasn't responding. He was only snickering to himself &... it seemed like he was holding something...

"What is that you have? You're hiding something from me, AREN'T you? Alright, let's see it!"

Keroro was selecting something to use on her. So many options, so little time. He had to choose one quick, or else Natsumi would catch on, pound him to a bloody pulp, or both.

111222211.content:
Keroro decided to try out the size option. He decided against using the growth feature, because not only would he need a lot of space to do it, he didn't want to expose what he was doing to anyone else. At least not yet. Besides, he wanted to reduce the former pink-haired terror down in more than just age to show just how helpless she was before him. So he activated the "Shrink" option, and fired at Baby Natsumi. Within a matter of seconds, the baby shrank down until she was no bigger than a mouse.

"Kero Kero Kero! Not so high-and-mighty now, are you, Natsumi-domo?" Keroro taunted, picking up Natsumi by the back of her dress (which shrank with her) and dangling her in front of his face, while occasionally poking her little tummy. The (really) tiny baby squeaked and cooed as she was being dangled high above the floor, practically oblivious to her current situation. Suddenly, she slid out of the little dress and started to fall towards the ground.

Whoops, thought Keroro, and quickly shot out his free hand to catch Natsumi in time. She was unhurt but dazed, and upon recovering, she started to crawl around on the Keronian's hand, as she was now small enough to fit on his palm with room to spare. Keroro sat down, put the dress back on the baby, and let her crawl and roll around on both his hands for a bit. He was amazed by this turn of events. Kururu's own shrinking device was huge and cumbersome, but he managed to find a way to fit the technology onto a more portable device, along with several other effects from some of his other creations. Despite being a creepy jerk, Keroro had to admit, Kururu was one heck of a scientist. As he watched Natsumi grab onto his thumb, he was trying to make up his mind on what to do now.

"That stupid frog, making me huge..." grumbled Natsumi, stepping out of the gaping hole she had created and into the streets. But with the gun in her hand, the pink-haired giant didn't look so angry. In fact, she looked giddy. "But I gotta say, all those old kaiju movies made it look... kinda fun !" she admitted to the world. "No monster to fight, no stupid frog to worry about, I can just explore however I want ! Maybe I should make myself a little bit more decent... nah !"

"But..." she hummed, looking at herself. "Kaijus are supposed to be bigger than that. No need being huge if I can't get the full experience. Fortunately..." she grinned, and started adjusting the settings of the gun. An easy task, since the gun was custom-made for Keroro, and the instructions were kept simple. Once she felt she had it, she put the gun against her temple, and closed her eyes with a big grin. "Here we go~"

She fired the laser, then reveled in the tingly feeling and seeing the scenery shrink before her eyes, as she grew larger by the second. She could see the whole block before, now the whole city landscape was in view ! When her growth spurt came to a halt, she stood at 200 feet tall ! The whole city looked awestruck at the teen titan, while she looked ecstatic.

"Whoaaaa, I'm humongous ! The city looks so pretty from up here !" she rejoiced, scrutinizing the horizon. "Hmm... Am I the right size though ?

"Gero, gero," Mois hears, almost jumping out of the couch in shock and waking Natsumi in the process.
"Oji-sama," Mois recognizes her "uncle's" trademark utterance. Keroro walks toward Mois with a sinister smirk on his face. His smirk enlarges upon noticing the baby Natsumi on Mois' arms. This slightly disturbed Mois.
"Good job, Mois-dono," Keroro complimented her.
"No problem, Oji-sama," Mois replies, happy to hear this from her figurative uncle, "You could say, anything for family?" Mois looks at Natsumi again. "So what are we doing to do with her?"
"We'll take her to Kururu for experimentation."
At this point, Mois' heart jumps in fear. "What?" she says, doing her best to keep Keroro from knowing her sudden discomfort.
"Yes. Kururu says that, with Natsumi-dono in this state, he can take Natsumi's DNA and then use his new transformation gadgets to produce an army of loyal keron soldiers with her abilities.
Mois feels unsure about what will be her next move. She wanted to make her oji-sama happy, but, at the same time, the thought of leaving Natsumi with Kururu while she is helpless made her shudder. At this point, two shoulder angels (yes, in this case, two angels would be more appropriate) appear from her imagination.
"Give Natsumi-san to Oji-sama," says the angel on her left shoulder. "Do it for him. You could say, a present from the heart?"
"No! Don't do this! You know this is wrong!" says the angel on her right shoulder. "She's just a baby! She will be scared and helpless like this! You need to protect her! You could say, motherly instinct?"
Mois looks at the cute, infant Natsumi sleeping on her arms again. She becomes more reluctant to act than before.
"Mois-dono?" Keroro notices Mois has not moved since he spoke. Mois needs to make a choice fast. She chooses to...

info.brief_description: Based off the hit anime/manga Keroro Gunso, Keroro decides to use TF to his advantage
info.description:
This is based off the hit manga/anime series Keroro Gunso.

Today, we see the amphibian-like invaders working with transformation, either for part of an invasion scheme, or just to mess around.

Transformations:
Age (AR/AP)
TG
Animal TF
Size (Shrink/ Grow)
Appearance
Oni Girl
Inanimate
Expansion

A lot of other transformations can be used, but there are a few rules.

No killing off characters
No sex or vore
Put effort in describing what's going on
Keep to the rating, people!

Other than that, anything goes! The first post is mainly the start to a specific plot line, but it's free to go in any direction you desire.
info.pretty_title: Keroro, Invasion Through TF! De Arimasu!
